Text: This book doesn't display any of it's pages. I have Adobe digital edition so I know it's not on my end. File corrupted?
@Mike I'm not sure, I bought this on my iPad then dragged it from iTunes to my desktop... It works on iPad.
It didn't work for me either and I have had no issues with any of the epubs.
This file is encrypted by Apple. It can't be read on any device except the one that downloaded it. Do on download it.
Didn't work for me either. Like to see somebody upload a version that works.
